Class TransactionItemData

java.lang.Object
plasystem_functions.TransactionItemData
public class TransactionItemData extends Object
Represents an item in a transaction in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the TransactionItems table. Stores details about the purchased product (ID, name, brand, size, type), quantity, unit price, and total price, with the total price rounded to two decimal places. Provides getters for accessing attributes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final int
    TI_buyQuantity
    The quantity purchased (TI_PROD_BUYQUANTITY, INTEGER NOT NULL, CHECK > 0).
    private final int
    TI_itemId
    The unique ID of the transaction item (TI_ITEM_ID, INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT).
    private final String
    TI_productBrand
    The brand of the product at the time of purchase (TI_PROD_BRAND, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final int
    TI_productId
    The ID of the associated product (TI_PROD_ID, INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY, nullable).
    private final String
    TI_productName
    The name of the product at the time of purchase (TI_PROD_NAME, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final String
    TI_productSize
    The size of the product at the time of purchase (TI_PROD_SIZE, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final String
    TI_productType
    The type of the product at the time of purchase (TI_PROD_TYPE, TEXT NOT NULL).
    private final double
    TI_totalPrice
    The total price of the item, rounded to two decimal places (TI_PROD_TOTALPRICE, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= TI_PROD_UNITPRICE).
    private final int
    TI_transId
    The ID of the associated transaction (TI_TRANS_ID, INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY).
    private final double
    TI_unitPrice
    The unit price of the product (TI_PROD_UNITPRICE, REAL NOT NULL, CHECK >= 0).

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionItemData

      public TransactionItemData(int TI_itemId, int TI_transId, int TI_productId, String TI_productName, String TI_productBrand, String TI_productSize, String TI_productType, int TI_buyQuantity, double TI_unitPrice, double TI_totalPrice)
      Constructs a TransactionItemData object with the specified values, initializing all attributes.Rounds the total price to two decimal places using HALF_UP rounding.
      Parameters:
      TI_itemId - The unique ID of the transaction item (auto-incremented by the database).
      TI_transId - The ID of the associated transaction. Must reference a valid TRANS_ID to match database constraints.
      TI_productId - The ID of the associated product. May be 0 if null in the database.
      TI_productName - The product name. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      TI_productBrand - The product brand. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      TI_productSize - The product size. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      TI_productType - The product type. Should not be null to match database constraints.
      TI_buyQuantity - The quantity purchased. Should be positive to match database constraints.
      TI_unitPrice - The unit price of the product. Should be non-negative to match database constraints.
      TI_totalPrice - The total price of the item. Should be at least equal to unitPrice to match database constraints.
